column4: (They release, pay and leave you with your new owner.)  Pleased to meet you my girl, I'm DialogCharacterName.
(They release, pay and leave you with your new owner.)  Come here girl, my name is DialogCharacterName.
(They release, pay and leave you with your new owner.)  Hello girl, I'm DialogCharacterName, your new owner.
From now on, you will call me "Mistress".  I'm sure we'll have a great time together.
